channel.title: chinese on Rumor Theory
channel.description: Recent content in chinese on Rumor Theory

item.title: Dear Swami Krushnaswarup, Sadhguru and Mohan Bhagwat, With All Due Respect, STFU
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); When Indian actors and stand-up comedians began expressing their opinions about religion and politics, they were told to STFU. The argument was that they weren’t qualified to talk about it.

item.title: DH Exclusive | Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev's Isha centre planned near Nandi Hills
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Spiritual leader Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev of the Isha Yoga Centre of Coimbatore is planning to set up a global spiritual centre at the foothills of Nandi Hills in Chikkaballapur district.

item.title: AB de Villiers asks Sadhguru for a lottery number, the Indian yogi comes up with a witty reply
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); There is one particular post of AB de Villiers that is doing rounds on social media. The former South Africa international recently posted a video of his chat with Sadhguru on Twitter.

item.title: Indian Guru Sadhguru On Living a Joyful Life
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); It might seem unlikely for a spiritual guru to reach rockstar levels of fame and adoration but that’s exactly what’s happened to India’s Sadhguru.

item.title: COVID-19: Sadhguru's Isha Yoga suspends all programmes across world
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Image Source : PTI COVID-19: Sadhguru’s Isha Yoga suspends all programmes across world Responding to the public health advisory issued by the Central government in the wake of the COVID-19, Isha Yoga Centre has announced suspension of all programmes at all its centers around the world until further notice.

item.title: COVID-19 impact: Isha Yoga Center suspends programmes around the world
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); BENGALURU: In response to the public health advisory issued by the Indian government, aimed at containing the spread of COVID-19 in the country, Isha Yoga Center, situated near Coimbatore in Tamil Nadu, has suspended programmes at all its centres around the world until further notice.

item.title: Coronavirus: Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev suspends all Isha Yoga Centre programmes
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Joining hands with the centre and the state in containing the spread of coronavirus outbreak, Isha Yoga Centre of noted Spiritual leader Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev has suspended all its programmes across the world until further notice.

item.title: 袁國勇倡入境人士須隔離 何栢良︰應拒部分非港人入境
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); 港大微生物學系講座教授袁國勇建議，所有入境本港的人

item.description: 交通部航政司司長葉協隆今在指揮中心表示，目前已完成居家檢疫者
